title: Searge: 将修复结构方块无法保存结构的问题

Searge: Thanks to dragnoz I finally figured out why saving of structures always worked for me, but not always in 16w20a. Fixed in the next snapshot
Searge: 多谢dragnoz，我终于知道为什么结构的保存在我这里正常工作，但在16w20a中出了问题。将会在下一个快照中修复
